page.title: 03Medical Services.
page.content: People have to travel to{Westbury}to see a doctor.Dr.Williams and Dr. Lewis work at Five Oaks,Westbury. The practice goes from Nesscliffe to Stiperstones and from Shrewsbury to Welshpool.There are 4,000 patients altogether.Morning surgery opens from 9 until 10:at night from from 5 to 6. After morning surgery they go to visit people who are too ill to drive. On a very busy day the doctors see be -tween 60 and 70 people altogether.If there are no urgent calls they go to see people who are always ill.As there is not a chemist in the area you are able to get your medicines from the dispensary in the surgery. Two babies have been born to families in the block this year {Adrian Randles (11.2.85) and{Anne-Marie Williams}(20. 4.85).Both were born in Copthorne hospital,Shrewsbury.
